tune.name: Ewan Galloway's Jig
tune.author: Mikael Georgii
tune.content:
\relative f' <<
  \new Voice {
    \clef treble
    \time 6/8
    \key g \minor

    \partial 8 a8 |
    g8 d a' bes d, c' |
    d8 ees d d c bes |
    bes8 c d d c bes |
    bes8 a g a4 g8 |
    \break

    fis8 d fis a fis a |
    c d c c bes a |
    a bes c c d ees |
    ees d c d4
    \bar "||" \break

    a8 |
    g8 d a' bes d, c' |
    d8 ees d d c bes |
    bes8 c d d ees f |
    aes8 g f g4 f8 |
    \break

    ees8 f g g f ees |
    ees8 d c d c bes |
    a8 bes c fis,8 d fis |
    g4. g4
    \bar "||" \break

    c8 |
    d8 g, d' ees d c |
    d8 g, d' ees d c |
    bes8 c d bes c d |
    d8 c bes a4 bes8 |
    \break

    c8 d, c' d d, c' |
    c8 d, c' d d, c' |
    a8 bes c c d ees |
    ees d c d4
    \bar "||" \break

    c8 |
    d8 g, d' ees d c |
    d8 g, d' ees d c |
    bes8 c d d ees f |
    aes8 g f g4 f8 |
    \break

    ees8 f g g f ees |
    ees8 d c d c bes |
    a8 bes c fis,8 d fis |
    g4. g4
    \bar "|."
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s8 |
      g4.:m g:m/bes | g2.:m | g:m | a4.:7 d:7 |
      d2. | d:7 | d | g4.:m s4

      s8 |
      g4.:m g:m/bes | g2.:m | g4.:m g:7 | c:m c:m/ees |
      c4.:m c:m6/a | g2.:m | c4.:m6/a d | g:m s4

      s8 |
      g2.:m | s | g:m | c4.:m6 d:7 |
      d2.:7 | s | d4. d/fis | g:m s4

      s8 |
      g2.:m | s | g4.:m g:7 | c:m c:m/ees |
      c4.:m c:m6/a | g2.:m | c4.:m6/a d | g:m s4
    }
  }
>>
